title: Nominations Sent to the Senate | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
December 06, 2010

 



Nominations Sent to the Senate





	Daniel M. Ashe, of Maryland, to be Director of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service, vice Samuel D. Hamilton.
	Kelvin K. Droegemeier, of Oklahoma, to be a Member of the National Science Board, National Science Foundation for a term expiring May 10, 2016.  (Reappointment)
	Maurice B. Foley, of Maryland, to be a Judge of the United States Tax Court for a term of fifteen years.  (Reappointment)
